titleInfo.title: Political Department letter from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is written from Bombay. Stannus requests an additional allowance for the Assistant Surgeon at Bushire [James Pringle Riach] to compensate for his receiving a lower salary than those in similar positions in certain Indian residencies received, especially as the Assistant Surgeon at Bushire was not allowed to trade, and in view of the unfavourable nature of the climate.
